sentences.en: Billiards is played by women as well as by men.
Do you feel like playing billiards to relax ourselves a little bit?
sentences.cn: 你想玩玩台球来轻松一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you like to play billiards?
John used to divert himself with billiards.
sentences.cn: 约翰过去总打台球自娱.

sentences.en: Jones simply walked over Brown at billiards.
sentences.cn: 在弹子游戏中,琼斯不费吹灰之力赢了布朗.

sentences.en: On holidays people often go to casinos to play roulette and billiards.
sentences.cn: 节假日人们常去赌场玩轮盘赌和台球戏.

sentences.en: Playing billiards , golf or bowling, isn't it just pushing balls around?
sentences.cn: 台球、保龄球 、 高尔夫球, 无非是球.

sentences.en: Shall we play a few games of billiards this evening?
sentences.cn: 今天晚上我们打台球好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Snow ball billiards pass back into homeland of billiards soon - --- Britain.
sentences.cn: 斯诺球台球很快便被传回了台球的故乡 ---- 英国.

sentences.en: The billiards player topped the cue ball to make It'spin forward.
sentences.cn: 台球比赛选手戳击母球上部使球向前旋转.

sentences.en: Would you like playing billiards to relax ourselves a little?
sentences.cn: 你想玩玩桌球来轻松一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can play billiards, table tennis , bridge, and go bowling.
sentences.cn: 您可以去打打台球 、 乓球 、 牌和保龄球.

trans.tran_en: a game played on a cloth-covered table in which balls are hit with a  cue (=  a long stick  )  against each other and into pockets at the edge of the table
